description:
A mysterious nun working together with Sousuke`s shadow Ao. She is trying to prevent Satomi from collecting all 8 beads.
Her existence is explained in a legend. She came to the country from a foreign land together with her two young sons. The government wasn`t too happy about that and forced her to give up one of them to the officials. She eventually decided to give up her youngest, whom was also very sickly at this time, so he had a chance of survival. They took him away and killed him. When the older son learned of that, he commited suicide. She was left devestated.
Later on it is found out that she is the woman everybody is looking for.
name: Tamazusa
